languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть медлит, а затем закрывает глаза и поднимает одну руку. Вас обдает потусторонним холодом. Масса плоти в клетке вдруг вздыбливается: мутант разрывает слепленный рот и начинает истошно кричать. Воплю вторят визги и мучительные стоны из соседних клеток.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть медлит, а затем вытаскивает небольшое устройство, которое прикрепляет к одной из клеток.{/n} "Я передам координаты своим людям. Когда Кьява Гамма вернется под твое управление, они заберут мутантов и передадут их нашим союзникам, которые смогут изучить природу варп-искажений".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс чуть медлит, а затем закрывает глаза и поднимает одну руку. Вас обдает потусторонним холодом. Масса плоти в клетке вдруг вздыбливается: мутант разрывает слепленный рот и начинает истошно кричать. Воплю вторят визги и мучительные стоны из соседних клеток.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希犹豫了一会儿，之后闭上眼睛，举起一只手。一股仿佛来自另一个世界的寒意将你笼罩其中。笼子里的那团肉突然直立起来，它扯开了粘在一起的嘴唇，疯狂地哀嚎起来。它的尖叫声与周围笼子里传来的嚎叫声与充满痛苦的呻吟声交相呼应着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希犹豫了一会儿，之后闭上眼睛，举起一只手。一股仿佛来自另一个世界的寒意将你笼罩其中。笼子里的那团肉突然直立起来，它扯开了粘在一起的嘴唇，疯狂地哀嚎起来。它的尖叫声与周围笼子里传来的嚎叫声与充满痛苦的呻吟声交相呼应着。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix duda por un momento y después cierra los ojos y levanta una mano. Un frío sobrenatural te rodea. La masa de carne de la jaula se yergue repentinamente. El mutante logra abrir los labios a pesar de que estaban pegados y empieza a gemir frenéticamente. Un coro de aullidos y gemidos torturados que brota de las jaulas cercanas se hace eco de sus gritos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix duda por un momento y después cierra los ojos y levanta una mano. Un frío sobrenatural te rodea. La masa de carne de la jaula se yergue repentinamente. El mutante logra abrir los labios a pesar de que estaban pegados y empieza a gemir frenéticamente. Un coro de aullidos y gemidos torturados que brota de las jaulas cercanas se hace eco de sus gritos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは一瞬ためらい、それから目を閉じて片手を上げる。あなたは別世界のような寒気に包まれた。檻の中の肉塊が唐突に立ち上がり、変異体が接着された唇を引き裂いて全力で泣き叫び始める。その悲鳴は、隣の檻から聞こえてくる遠吠えと拷問のようなうめき声の合唱によって反響する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは一瞬ためらい、それから目を閉じて片手を上げる。あなたは別世界のような寒気に包まれた。檻の中の肉塊が唐突に立ち上がり、変異体が接着された唇を引き裂いて全力で泣き叫び始める。その悲鳴は、隣の檻から聞こえてくる遠吠えと拷問のようなうめき声の合唱によって反響する。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zögert einen Moment, schließt dann die Augen und hebt eine Hand. Eine außerweltliche Kälte umgibt dich. Die Fleischmasse im Käfig bäumt sich plötzlich auf: Der Mutant öffnet gewaltsam seine zusammengeklebten Lippen und heult wild. Die Schreie finden ein Echo in einem Chor gequälten Stöhnens aus den benachbarten Käfigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

Die Schreie finden ein Echo in einem Chor gequälten Stöhnens aus den benachbarten Käfigen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hésite un instant, puis ferme les yeux et lève une main. Une sensation de froid surnaturelle vous enveloppe. D'un seul coup, la masse de chair dans la cage se dresse, et la mutante ouvre ses lèvres soudées pour se mettre à crier frénétiquement, bientôt accompagnée d'un concert de hurlements et de gémissements torturés provenant des cages voisines.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

D'un seul coup, la masse de chair dans la cage se dresse, et la mutante ouvre ses lèvres soudées pour se mettre à crier frénétiquement, bientôt accompagnée d'un concert de hurlements et de gémissements torturés provenant des cages voisines.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir an için tereddüt eden Heinrix, gözlerini kapatıp bir elini kaldırıyor. Olağanüstü bir soğuk etrafını sarıyor. Kafesteki et yığını aniden ayaklanıyor. Mutant, yapışmış dudaklarını açıp çılgınca haykırmaya başlıyor. Diğer kafeslerden bu haykırışa eşlik eden uluma sesleri ve iniltiler duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix hesitates for a moment, then closes his eyes and raises one hand. You are enveloped by an otherworldly chill. The mass of flesh in the cage suddenly rears up: the mutant wrenches open its glued-together lips and begins wailing frantically. The shrieking is echoed by a chorus of howls and tortured moans coming from the neighbouring cages.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, bir an için tereddüt ediyor ve gözlerini kapatıp bir elini kaldırıyor. Etrafını, olağanüstü bir soğuk sarıyor. Kafesteki et yığını aniden ayaklanıyor. Mutant, yapışmış dudaklarını açıp çılgınca haykırmaya başlıyor. Diğer kafeslerden bu haykırışa eşlik eden uluma sesleri ve iniltiler duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
